price: 91. Entonces se dirigió rápidamente hacia los ídolos de su pueblo y les preguntó: “¿No comen?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
